issue.title: RGBD Camera RGB data is clipped to 5 meters

content.raw: That's how `gazebo_ros_openni_kinect` operates since it was introduced a long time ago AFAIK. Always bugged me too, but never enough as to implement a fix. I guess increasing the far frustum range and then cutting out up to a threshold for generating depth data would be fairly easy?
content.html: That's how gazebo_ros_openni_kinect operates since it was introduced a long time ago AFAIK. Always bugged me too, but never enough as to implement a fix. I guess increasing the far frustum range and then cutting out up to a threshold for generating depth data would be fairly easy?
